hanzi-su-wiki:
潟

Значения

Взморье, лагуна

Мнемоника

На море, у воды 氵, живут хищные сороки (голова с зубами, тело и перья 灬).

Варианты

泻
purpleculture_pinyin:
xì
saline land; salt marsh
засоленная земля; болото, периодически затопляемое морской водой
rtega_mnemonic:
潟潟RSlagoon, saline land
  • body of water 氵 the form of a shoe 舄
purpleculture_info: Pictophonetic: 舄 indicates the sound; 氵 (water) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
新潟县 [ xīn xì xiàn ]: Niigata prefecture in northwest Japan
潟湖 [ xì hú ]: lagoon; erroneously written 泻湖
新潟 [ xīn xì ]: Niigata, a city and prefecture in Japan
purpleculture_tree:
• ⿰ Left to right
    • 氵 [ shuǐ ] water
    • 舄 [ xì ] shoe, the sole of a shoe; magpie
heisig_constituent: lagoon, water, water droplets, water pistol, mortar, tail feathers
koohiiStory1: Right part: mortar bound up over oven fire, comprising boiling cauldron. Lagoon is a shallow pond, thus easily warmed by sun, large-scale equivalent of a boiling cauldron.
koohiiStory2: I stapled both sides of some tail feathers to a waterfall towering over the lagoon to give it a more tropical feel…　　　　　　　　　　　　　　　RTK2:　On list of rare or no official Chinese reading.
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: A tsunami crashes into the sun (breaking it in half) and creating a different wing of the tsunami all together. This wing crashes down and creates a lagoon.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: The lagoon is beautiful! The water is hot (from hitting the sun) but it isn't so bright that you'll get a sunburn.
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: This lagoon was created on purpose by a really angry dude and his catapult (かた). He wanted a nice place to lounge that's tropical, but not too bright. So he came up with a plan: use a giant catapult to send a tsunami into the sun!
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Now picture it all in slow motion. The catapult tosses the tsunami into the air, it smashes the sun, breaks off into a wing of nice, hot water, and finally splashes back to the earth into a beautiful, secluded lagoon.
Ru_Radicals: 勹 (обёртка), 汁 (суп), 杰, 臼 (ступа)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: the water (氵) by the magpie (舄) is a lagoon

潟字的基本解释

潟
xì
咸水浸渍的土地：潟卤（盐碱地）。

潟字的汉语字典释义

[①]［xì］
［《廣韻》思積切，入昔，心。］
盐碱地。

潟字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　潟； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页649第16
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?思積切，音昔。鹵地也。鹹土逆水之處，水寫去，其地爲鹹鹵。【周禮·地官·草人】凡糞種，鹹潟用貆。【註】潟，鹵也。　亦作舄。詳舄字註。　又【集韻】七約切，音碏。義同。　又昌石切，音尺。與滷同。苦地。與斥通。　又亭歷切，音狄。義同。

潟字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
潟字的起名意思

暂无。

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Shui Character Department] 　 Xie; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 649 16
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? Thinking and cutting, the sound. Ludi also. Where the salty soil is against the water, the water is written, and the ground is salty brine. 【Zhou Li·Diguan·Grassman】The dung species are used for salty diarrhea. [Note] Diarrhea, halogen also.　Also used as a scoop. Detailed note of the word.　[Jiyun] Qiyue cut, sound chin. The same meaning.　Youchang stone cut, sound ruler. Same as halogen. Bitterly. Repel through.　You Ting Liqie, Yin Di. The same meaning.

xì
засоленная приморская земля; приморский солончак
海滨广潟 широкая полоса засоленных приморских земель по берегу моря
Radicals: 氵, 日, 勿  (tsunami, sun, wing)
Meaning Mnemonic
A tsunami crashes into the sun (breaking it in half) and creating a different wing of the tsunami all together. This wing crashes down and creates a lagoon.
The lagoon is beautiful! The water is hot (from hitting the sun) but it isn't so bright that you'll get a sunburn.
Reading Mnemonic
This lagoon was created on purpose by a really angry dude and his catapult (かた). He wanted a nice place to lounge that's tropical, but not too bright. So he came up with a plan: use a giant catapult to send a tsunami into the sun!
Now picture it all in slow motion. The catapult tosses the tsunami into the air, it smashes the sun, breaks off into a wing of nice, hot water, and finally splashes back to the earth into a beautiful, secluded lagoon.
